default.name: clarify_direction
default.label: Clarify direction
default.intent: Decide what outcomes matter and why for the enterprise.
default.description: Decide what outcomes matter and why for the enterprise.

default.name: shape_the_portfolio
default.label: Shape the portfolio
default.intent: Choose where to invest, what to stop, and how to balance risk and reward.
default.description: Choose where to invest, what to stop, and how to balance risk and reward.

default.name: frame_initiatives
default.label: Frame initiatives
default.intent: Turn strategic bets into coherent programs, products, and initiatives.
default.description: Turn strategic bets into coherent programs, products, and initiatives.

default.name: translate_into_work
default.label: Translate into work
default.intent: Break initiatives into ready work with owners, milestones, and measures.
default.description: Break initiatives into ready work with owners, milestones, and measures.

default.name: coordinate_execution
default.label: Coordinate execution
default.intent: Keep execution aligned, sequenced, and unblocked across teams.
default.description: Keep execution aligned, sequenced, and unblocked across teams.

default.name: measure_impact
default.label: Measure impact
default.intent: Measure whether strategic work is delivering the intended outcomes.
default.description: Measure whether strategic work is delivering the intended outcomes.

default.name: adjust_strategy
default.label: Adjust strategy
default.intent: Refine strategy, portfolio, and plans based on learning and performance.
default.description: Refine strategy, portfolio, and plans based on learning and performance.

default.name: understand_the_need
default.label: Understand the need
default.intent: Clarify the problem, context, and users to be served.
default.description: Clarify the problem, context, and users to be served.

default.name: design_the_solution
default.label: Design the solution
default.intent: Decide how the experience and system should work end-to-end.
default.description: Decide how the experience and system should work end-to-end.

default.name: build_and_integrate
default.label: Build & integrate
default.intent: Implement software, data, and integrations following golden paths.
default.description: Implement software, data, and integrations following golden paths.

default.name: assure_quality_and_security
default.label: Assure quality & security
default.intent: Validate that the change behaves, performs, and is secure enough.
default.description: Validate that the change behaves, performs, and is secure enough.

default.name: release_and_adopt
default.label: Release & adopt
default.intent: Release safely and drive adoption with the right enablement.
default.description: Release safely and drive adoption with the right enablement.

default.name: operate_and_protect
default.label: Operate & protect
default.intent: Operate the product or service reliably and securely.
default.description: Operate the product or service reliably and securely.

default.name: learn_and_iterate
default.label: Learn & iterate
default.intent: Use signals to improve the product, platform, and flow.
default.description: Use signals to improve the product, platform, and flow.

default.name: create_and_capture_demand
default.label: Create & capture demand
default.intent: Make the right customers aware and interested, and turn anonymous interest into identifiable demand.
default.description: Make the right customers aware and interested, and turn anonymous interest into identifiable demand.

default.name: qualify_and_shape_opportunities
default.label: Qualify & shape opportunities
default.intent: Focus on winnable, valuable opportunities and understand their needs and constraints.
default.description: Focus on winnable, valuable opportunities and understand their needs and constraints.

default.name: agree_on_value_and_terms
default.label: Agree on value & terms
default.intent: Reach a mutually acceptable configuration, price, and set of commercial terms.
default.description: Reach a mutually acceptable configuration, price, and set of commercial terms.

default.name: commit_and_capture_the_order
default.label: Commit & capture the order
default.intent: Turn the agreed deal into a binding order or contract that the organization can fulfill.
default.description: Turn the agreed deal into a binding order or contract that the organization can fulfill.

default.name: deliver_the_promise
default.label: Deliver the promise
default.intent: Fulfill the product or service and deliver the expected experience.
default.description: Fulfill the product or service and deliver the expected experience.

default.name: collect_cash_and_account
default.label: Collect cash & account
default.intent: Invoice correctly, collect cash, and handle adjustments and disputes.
default.description: Invoice correctly, collect cash, and handle adjustments and disputes.

default.name: recognize_value_and_grow
default.label: Recognize value & grow
default.intent: Recognize revenue properly, understand profitability, and deepen the relationship.
default.description: Recognize revenue properly, understand profitability, and deepen the relationship.

default.name: plan_the_workforce
default.label: Plan the workforce
default.intent: Decide what roles, skills, and capacity are needed to deliver strategy.
default.description: Decide what roles, skills, and capacity are needed to deliver strategy.

default.name: attract_and_select_talent
default.label: Attract & select talent
default.intent: Find and choose people to fill those needs.
default.description: Find and choose people to fill those needs.

default.name: onboard_and_enable
default.label: Onboard & enable
default.intent: Get people productive, connected, and compliant.
default.description: Get people productive, connected, and compliant.

default.name: organize_and_guide_work
default.label: Organize & guide work
default.intent: Align goals, responsibilities, and day-to-day work.
default.description: Align goals, responsibilities, and day-to-day work.

default.name: grow_and_support_talent
default.label: Grow & support talent
default.intent: Develop skills, wellbeing, and career paths.
default.description: Develop skills, wellbeing, and career paths.

default.name: reward_and_comply
default.label: Reward & comply
default.intent: Pay fairly, manage benefits, and meet regulatory obligations.
default.description: Pay fairly, manage benefits, and meet regulatory obligations.

default.name: analyze_and_adapt
default.label: Analyze & adapt
default.intent: Use workforce insights to change org design, roles, and strategy.
default.description: Use workforce insights to change org design, roles, and strategy.

default.name: understand_risk_and_obligations
default.label: Understand risk & obligations
default.intent: Know what could go wrong and what regulatory, contractual, and ethical obligations exist.
default.description: Know what could go wrong and what regulatory, contractual, and ethical obligations exist.

default.name: set_policy_and_appetite
default.label: Set policy & appetite
default.intent: Decide what is acceptable, what controls are required, and how much risk to take.
default.description: Decide what is acceptable, what controls are required, and how much risk to take.

default.name: embed_controls
default.label: Embed controls
default.intent: Make risk and compliance part of everyday processes, systems, and data handling.
default.description: Make risk and compliance part of everyday processes, systems, and data handling.

default.name: monitor_and_detect
default.label: Monitor & detect
default.intent: Continuously watch for issues, breaches, and emerging risks.
default.description: Continuously watch for issues, breaches, and emerging risks.

default.name: respond_and_remediate
default.label: Respond & remediate
default.intent: Fix issues, learn, and reduce the chance and impact of recurrence.
default.description: Fix issues, learn, and reduce the chance and impact of recurrence.

default.name: assure_and_report
default.label: Assure & report
default.intent: Provide evidence and narratives to boards, regulators, and stakeholders.
default.description: Provide evidence and narratives to boards, regulators, and stakeholders.

default.name: maintain_resilience
default.label: Maintain resilience
default.intent: Ensure continuity and recovery when disruptions happen.
default.description: Ensure continuity and recovery when disruptions happen.
